Description: Painting; A battle beneath the walls of a town. Two horses almost collide in the foreground, while archers and footmen fight in the distance. No text. Opaque watercolour on paper.
Bibliographic references: Institut du Monde Arabe 2001 / L'Orient de Saladin: l'art des Ayyoubides (62)
Ettinghausen et al. 2001 / Islamic Art and Architecture 650-1250 (fig.342)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (176)
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.116, fig.1)
Albukhary 2018 / The Making of the Albukhary Foundation Gallery of the Islamic World (p.28, fig.7)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015 1 Apr-15 Sep, Berlin, Bode Museum, 'Ein Gott: Abrahams Erben am Nil' 2001-2002 22 Oct-10 Mar, Paris, Institut du Monde Arabe, 'L'Orient de Saladin au temps des Ayyoubides'
